actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery near the Fort Randall Dam., S. Dak.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery at the southeast side of Fort Randall Dam, South Dakota. Authorizes the transfer of land by the Department of the Army for such purpose. Authorizes the appropriation of sums necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery near the Fort Randall Dam., S. Dak.
